statements: SELECT * FROM customer_credentials WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, username FROM customer_credentials WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT customer_id, password FROM customer_credentials WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM customer_credentials WHERE password = 'securepassword';
SELECT customer_id, username, password FROM customer_credentials WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM customer_credentials WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT username FROM customer_credentials WHERE customer_id = 2 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT customer_id, username FROM customer_credentials WHERE customer_id IN (3, 4) ORDER BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customer_credentials WHERE username LIKE 'A%' AND password LIKE '%B';
SELECT customer_id FROM customer_credentials WHERE password = 'password123';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT username FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, username FROM customers ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM support_tickets WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT ticket_id, ticket_details FROM support_tickets ORDER BY ticket_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT username, password FROM customers WHERE customer_id > 3 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT customers.username, support_tickets.ticket_details FROM customers JOIN support_tickets ON customers.customer_id = support_tickets.customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(ticket_id) AS total_tickets FROM support_tickets GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_tickets > 2;
SELECT DISTINCT customers.username, support_tickets.ticket_details FROM customers, support_tickets WHERE customers.customer_id = support_tickets.customer_id ORDER BY customers.username DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers
SELECT customer_username, customer_password FROM customers
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products
SELECT customer_username, order_date, order_status FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id
SELECT customer_username, product_name, product_price FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id JOIN products p ON o.order_id = p.product_id
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_username ASC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_username FROM customers WHERE customer_password = 'abc123';
SELECT customer_username, order_date, order_status FROM customers INNER JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_status = 'shipped' AND order_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT MAX(product_price) AS max_price, MIN(product_price) AS min_price FROM products;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, username FROM customers WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50.00;
SELECT * FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, login_time, logout_time FROM sessions WHERE logout_time IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM customers INNER JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id ORDER BY customers.username ASC;

SELECT products.product_name, products.price, customers.username FROM products INNER JOIN orders ON products.product_id = orders.product_id INNER JOIN customers ON orders.customer_id = customers.customer_id WHERE products.price > 50;
SELECT customers.username, COUNT(orders.order_id) AS total_orders FROM customers LEFT JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id GROUP BY customers.username ORDER BY total_orders DESC;

SELECT DISTINCT customers.username, products.product_name, orders.order_date FROM customers INNER JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id INNER JOIN products ON orders.product_id = products.product_id;

SELECT customers.username, products.product_name, orders.order_date FROM customers INNER JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id INNER JOIN products ON orders.product_id = products.product_id WHERE customers.username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT username, password FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT title, status FROM support_tickets ORDER BY ticket_id DESC;
SELECT street_address, city, state, postal_code FROM addresses WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT comment, timestamp FROM comments WHERE ticket_id = 3 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM addresses WHERE city = 'New York' ORDER BY postal_code ASC;
SELECT title, description FROM support_tickets WHERE status = 'Open' AND customer_id = 1;
SELECT comment, timestamp FROM comments WHERE ticket_id = 101 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT customer_id, token, expiration_time FROM sessions WHERE customer_id = 5;
